first_translate: it’s as if  I’ve been struck by god himself.
this is my first time seeing such skill from another magician.
in fact,  I’ll become the final boss one day.
because your ego will probably get the best of you soon enough.

hangle: 설마 이 정도로는 부족하다고 여기서 던지려는 건 아니지?!
first_translate: d-don’t tell me that wasn’t good enough for him! he can’t possibly quit now...!!
